name: Yesh Invoice Invoices for WooCommerce
author: Yesh Invoice

sections.description:
Yesh Invoice plugin allows you to send automatic invoices for any transaction on your your WooCommerce website.

Use Yesh Invoice plugin to help run your business and sell without a hassel:
• Easy to connect to.
• Use for clearing with credit companies.
• Use for any payments installments.
• Perfect invoices that you can customize with your very own signature and logo.
• Invoices are signed digitally.

About Us

Yesh Invoice is a brilliant invoice platform that lets you issue invoices without a limit, has useful reports, great analytics, let’s you manage your expenses and add third party integrations.
With Yesh Invoice you have access to all our great features at a fix price, no need to pay more. Thanks to Yesh Invoice you can run your business online easily. We have worked hard to make it simple for you to manage your expenses and incomes. Why pay more will others when you can have it all with Yesh Invoice?
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Yesh Invoice Tab.
sections.faq:
What is Yesh Invoice?

Yesh Invoice is the best Digital Invoices for business. You can manager your customers, invoices, expenses management, reports, credit card, documents backup and more.

Which invoice documents can I produce?

After the purchase you have the ability to choose with this tax invoice / receipt or receipt.

I have to options to choose currency?

yes, you have the ability to choose which currency the invoice will be, inside admin page.

Can I customize my invoice?

Yes, we have a lot templates and colors. You can choose and play with the colors. To do so, go to your account in Yesh Invoice App.

Do I need a developer to install the plugin?

No, you can do it by yourself.
